item.description:
This place has this mouth-watering eggplant dish, and the lamb is delicieux here! If you like rose, and if you like lemonade, then I recommend ordering a glass of Baraka's lemonade - it must be what the gods drink, it's soo so good. Like drinking a flower.
Please rsvp, because I will reserve a table for us ahead of time (it's a small place - very European!).
item.why: Je propose un verre (ou deux, ou trois!), des amuses-gueules, ou peut-etre un repas at my favorite petit resto in Cambridge - Baraka Cafe. Great for meet-ups because it is intimate, quiet, and full of ethnic atmosphere.
item.name: Allons-y a l'Algerie!
